card.fact: Harriet Augusta Newcomb presented the Old Town Hall to the town in 1882
The Building acted as a community center, holding various events.
The first movie shown here was the 1923 Lon Chaney version of The Hunchback of Notre Dame.

card.text: By 1947 the building had fallen into disrepair. In 1949 the town clerk, treasure and collector had an office in the Town Hall.

card.fact: At the end of the 70s the town moved its offices and the building became neglected.
The college bought the building in 1982 and used it as storage.
The College sold the building in 1986 to only be bought back in 1990

card.text: Old Town Hall Bookstore opened in 1992.
